Note:1.Number of village clinics was included in health care institutions.
2.Since 2002, health care institutions no longer includes headquarters of higher and secondary medical schools, drug test institutions, frontier health and quarantine institutions and fami
3.The reasons of decrease of community health service centers (stations) in 2008 is that 5000 rural community health service stations in Jiangsu are divided into village clinics.
4.Before 1996, outpatient departments did not include private clinics.
Data SourcesNational Bureau of Statistics
